name: stuart
text: Ray signed his soul away the way he signs his emails

name: snowman
text: And apparently Lucifer designed the Deftones' logo.

name: snowman
text: A comment left by snowman was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by intergalactic_, StagnantDisplay, woodenteeth, WoozyB, BrokeAccount, Fathington, mastema23, ouroboros)

name: fathington
text: It is silly to hate the Deftones, YOU PIECE OF SHIT FUCK I AM ANGRY AT YOU WHOEVER YOU ARE. Not really though.

name: faits
text: everyone who writes in cursive is designing the deftones logo every time

name: aperson
text: Yeah that's a pretty long contract alright.

name: evolume
text: When I was a day-camp councilor one summer, I bought two of the kids' souls for a dollar a piece.  They quickly spent the money on ice cream bars.  The next day one of the kids, Andrew, told me that his mom said I had to give the soul back.  I said "fine, give me back my dollar."  But, oops! he spent it on ice cream.  "I HOPE THAT ICE CREAM WAS WORTH IT ANDREW!"  AH HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!

name: rotating-dog
text: Please tell me you kept the souls in a jar, and taunted the children.

name: snowman
text: He shook the jar and made the souls fight.

name: zapatos
text: I wish they were so easily collected.

name: woodenteeth
text: ... I wish you would finally leave me alone Soul Catcher Zapatos! Curse you!

name: zapatos
text: I'm sorry but I cannot do that, I heard you get tri-attack at level sixteen.

name: speedwell
text: I love how Ray signs his name the same way as the ill-fated Todd logo

name: notcool
text:
I thought that was some kinda sick goat-ear for a moment.

EVERYTHING CONFUSES ME NOW!

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Why would Lucifer want Ray's soul? Are things really that hard-up in hades?
